类的使用
io.milvus.param.R

使用R的程序包
程序包
说明
io.milvus.client
Provides classes to create a Milvus client to communicate with a compatible Milvus instance.

  • io.milvus.client中R的使用

    返回R的io.milvus.client中的方法
    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.AlterAlias(AlterAliasParam requestParam)
    Changes an alias for a collection.
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.CreateAlias(CreateAliasParam requestParam)
    Creates an alias for a user
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.CreateCollection(CreateCollectionParam requestParam)
    Creates a collection with a pre-defined schema.
    R<Task>
    MilvusClient.CreateIndex(CreateIndexParam requestParam)
    Creates an index on the specified field in a collection.
    R<DescribeCollectionResponse>
    MilvusClient.DescribeCollection(DescribeCollectionParam requestParam)
    Describes the detail of a collection.
    R<DescribeIndexResponse>
    MilvusClient.DescribeIndex(DescribeIndexParam requestParam)
    Describes the index of a collection.
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.DropAlias(DropAliasParam requestParam)
    Drops a specified alias.
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.DropCollection(DropCollectionParam requestParam)
    Drops a collection with all the entities it contains.
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.DropIndex(DropIndexParam requestParam)
    Drops the index of a collection.
    R<GetCollectionStatisticsResponse>
    MilvusClient.GetCollectionStatistics(GetCollectionStatisticsParam requestParam)
    Lists the statistical items of a collection.
    R<Boolean>
    MilvusClient.HasCollection(HasCollectionParam requestParam)
    Shows whether a collection after the specified name exists.
    R<ListAliasesResponse>
    MilvusClient.ListAliases(ListAliasesParam requestParam)
    Lists all aliases associated with the specified collection.
    R<ListCollectionsResponse>
    MilvusClient.ListCollections(ListCollectionsParam requestParam)
    Lists all collection names in the database.
    R<Task>
    MilvusClient.LoadCollection(LoadCollectionParam requestParam)
    Loads a collection to make it prepared for searches and queries.
    R<RpcStatus>
    MilvusClient.ReleaseCollection(ReleaseCollectionParam requestParam)
    Releases the loaded collection from memory.
